pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multiple Hypothesis Testing // Seven different methods for multiple testing problems. The SGoF-type methods (see for example, Carvajal Rodrguez et al., 2009 doi:10.1186/1471-2105-10-209; de Ua lvarez, 2012 doi:10.1515/1544-6115.1812; Castro Conde et al., 2015 doi:10.1177/0962280215597580) and the BH and BY false discovery rate controlling procedures.
